messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Alcoholism
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/20/2003 2:06:28 AM Central Daylight Time, ... This is very interesting to me....I have a brother who has become addicted to everything
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/20/2003 2:06:28 AM Central Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> No doubt you could name lots of factors, but your parents could not have
> create alcoholism in you if you didn't have ANY genetic predisposition to
> it.
>

This is very interesting to me....I have a brother who has become addicted to
everything he's touched (crack, cigarettes, alcohol, pot, you name it.) I
would say that he has a very addictive personality. Thing is, no one in my family
is addicted to anything, as far back as great-grandparents. It makes me
wonder how it happens.
Amy Kagey
Email me for a list
of used homeschooling books!
<A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=1684902">my Usborne Books website!</A>
